mapper.sql: student_num studentNum, student_name studentName, student_id studentId,student_pw studentPw, student_birth studentBirth, student_email studentEmail, student_gender studentGender, student_phone studentPhone, student_addr studentAddr, student_addr_detail studentAddrDetail, student_post studentPost, student_email_conf studentEmailConf
mapper.select: select c.course_num, c.course_name , c.course_content , c.teacher_num , c.course_url , sc.student_num, t.teacher_name from student_course sc join course c on (sc.course_num = c.course_num) join teacher t on (c.teacher_num = t.teacher_num) where sc.student_num = #{studentNum}
